name: Serie A Football 2023
description:
SERIE A FOOTBALL 2023
by Simone Causo

CALCIO'S ELITE
Manage one of the 20 Serie A TIM 2022-2023 teams and achieve its goals.
Take on the Serie A season as the current manager or a new one
You will be given two goals to achieve by the end of the championship
You will be able to strengthen the team during the transfer market
Keep an eye out for warnings, injuries and suspensions
Choose the 11 who will take the field and the squad
Choose the game plan that best suits your style
Maintain consistent performance to avoid being sacked
Your players will get stronger or weaker based on the form of the team

TAKE THE FIELD (In development)

Take the field with the team and help them win!
Currently only available in PRACTICE MATCH mode, 
still a lot of work to do with gameplay, A.I., football rules and graphics.
Play in Low-poly models of the Serie A stadiums

MATCH MODE CONTROLS
A - Long Pass / Sliding Tackle
S - Pass / Switch Player
D - Shoot / Standing Tackle
E - Sprint
Arrow Keys - Move
R - Replay
Escape - Quit Practice Match
V - Change Camera
L - Day / Sunset
N - Day / Night

This game was made with Game Maker (8.1), which is mostly used for 2D games. Making the match mode in 3D was not very easy, it is still in development and some important things are missing in the gameplay. Still playable and hopefully enjoyable though.
I made the 3d models myself so they are not completely accurate.
The game is entirely in English, while I'm not. So I apologize in advance for any translation errors

The game contains names and logos of the Serie A championship, it was made for fun and not for any kind of profit, I do not own any rights.
